name: In the Soil
description:
A short horror game that I made to teach myself how to build levels, use things like particle effects, Animations, shaders, scripting... It was way too ambitious for a 3 month development time, but it was REALLY educational. 

You're an employee of the EPA here to investigate reports of bizarre substances found in the water and soil of a farmhouse that was abandoned under mysterious circumstances, as if the owner just woke up one day and wandered into the woods, never to return. Collect some samples and then return to your car to see your score. 

All models and textures are by me. All sounds courtesy of https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/  

Controls: 

Movement: WASD or Right stick

Look: Mouse or Left stick

Look at: Right mouse button or East Button

Jump: Spacebar or South button

Use/Pickup: Left mouse button or Right trigger

Pause Menu: Keyboard Escape or Start button
